roleset.name: set, establish, decide

example.name: specify a WH-phrase
example.text: [Mr. Edelman]-1 declined *trace*-1 to specify what prompted the recent moves

example.name: specify an NP
example.text: First Interstate said its operations outside of Arizona ``achieved results as expected for the quarter,'' but didn't specify the results.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'specify' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Comparison to 'determine' Member of VN class characterize-29.2.
